Container.Name: mycelium-warning
Container.Overview: Allows to spam ping alea when he is sleeping too much and risks getting mycelium cubes.

Config.Name: Discord WebHook URL
Config.Description: Where to send your pings too. Must be a webhook.

Config.Name: Check Interval
Config.Description: How often to query the Hypixel API

Config.Name: Minecraft UUID 1
Config.Description: The UUID of the first player you want to check for

Config.Name: Profile Cutename 1
Config.Description: The profile cute name (fruit) of the first player you want to check for

Config.Name: Discord iD 1
Config.Description: The discord id to ping once the mycelium levels are too high

Config.Name: Minecraft UUID 2
Config.Description: The UUID of the first player you want to check for

Config.Name: Profile Cutename 2
Config.Description: The profile cute name (fruit) of the first player you want to check for

Config.Name: Discord iD 2
Config.Description: The discord id to ping once the mycelium levels are too high

Config.Name: Minecraft UUID 3
Config.Description: The UUID of the first player you want to check for

Config.Name: Profile Cutename 3
Config.Description: The profile cute name (fruit) of the first player you want to check for

Config.Name: Discord iD 3
Config.Description: The discord id to ping once the mycelium levels are too high
